query: dialog with R's persona: persona: my favorite color is red. i enjoy listening to classical music. i'm a christian. i can drive a tractor. context:  Q: in a few years once you'll be ready . my father was a great dad . R: well you have great examples . are you handy at all ? Q: my dad works at a home improvement store , so i learn alot from him . R: <extra_id_0>
answers: that's good . home maintenance is important .
generation: that is good. i hope he does well in his job.

passages.title: Samantha is Self-Sufficient
passages.text: My dad always taught me how to be self-sufficient. I even taught myself how to change a tyre on a car. One day my tyre blew while I was driving. I was able to properly change my tyre. I was very grateful to be able to get home safely.

passages.title: Bill Goes to Graduate School
passages.text: I decide that I want to pursue a master's degree after college. While my friends are all looking for jobs, I am applying for a school. At first I worried that I was making the wrong decision. However, when I get to graduate school, I feel great. I am proud that I will soon have a master's degree.

passages.title: Mike goes to university
passages.text: I realized that I needed to have a reliable skill. I decided to go to college to learn a skill for employment. I drove to the local university and asked for help. I became enrolled and began to study to be an engineer. Unfortunately, I did not enjoy school and decided to drop out.

passages.title: Change Clothes
passages.text: I was at my grandma's house. They had just gotten back from my grandpa's funeral. Everyone was anxious to change into comfortable clothes. I was the last one in the house. I had to wait for a room to open so I could change.

passages.title: In Training
passages.text: I was mad at my puppy. It ruined my couch. And it damaged my coffee table. But I realized it was my fault. I didn't train it properly.

passages.title: Bob Lies
passages.text: I was not an honest man. I could not tell the truth. I told a lie to my boss. My boss found out and fired Bob. I am now on welfare.
